document.docAuthor: Kment, Petr, Jindra, Zdeněk & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: New synonymies and new records of Afrotropical and Madagascan Pentatominae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New synonymies and new records of Afrotropical and Madagascan Pentatominae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

(description, faunistics). Syntypes : ‘Habitat in Guinea . Dom. Hesse. Mus. Dom. Lund.’ ( 2 syntypes in ZMUC—see Zimsen 1961 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dichelocephala virescens
Stål, 1854
: 226−227 . Syntype (s): South Africa : ‘Habitat ad Boschjesmans Rand’ ( NHRS ). Synonymised by
Stål ( 1865 : 132 )
.

Bionomics.
Cachan ( 1952 )
reported
Acoloba lanceolata
in great numbers in axiles of leaves of
Pandanus
( Pandanaceae ) in Madagascar . Le
Pelley ( 1959 )
and
Poutouli ( 1992 )
listed it on sorghum ( Sorghum vulgare ) in Kenya and Togo , respectively. Here the species is recorded on
Pandanus
in Ivory Coast ,
Dracaena
( Asparagaceae ) in Malawi , and
Dioscorea bulbifera
( Dioscoreaceae ) in Nigeria . All the mentioned plants are monocots.

Distribution. Angola ( new record ), Central African Republic ( new record ), Democratic Republic of the Congo (

,
